marketOverview.title: Market Overview
marketOverview.rapidGrowth.title: Rapid Market Growth
marketOverview.rapidGrowth.text: The copy trading industry has experienced exponential growth, with platforms like TED Brokers playing a vital role in democratizing financial markets. The global copy trading market is expected to surpass $5 billion by 2028, driven by increased retail investor participation and demand for passive income strategies.
marketOverview.userCentric.title: User-Centric Investment Models
marketOverview.userCentric.text: TED Brokers capitalizes on a shift towards user-friendly, low-barrier investment models. Modern traders increasingly favor intuitive platforms that allow them to mirror professional strategies with minimal effort, making social and copy trading a preferred entry point for beginners in forex, crypto, and stock trading.
marketOverview.technology.title: Technology & Automation
marketOverview.technology.text: Automation, AI, and advanced analytics are shaping the future of copy trading. TED Brokers leverages these technologies to optimize trade execution, signal accuracy, and risk management—ensuring clients benefit from real-time market opportunities with greater efficiency and transparency.
marketOverview.globalAdoption.title: Global Adoption & Reach
marketOverview.globalAdoption.text: With increased internet penetration and mobile accessibility, TED Brokers is reaching new markets across Asia, Africa, and South America. The global expansion of copy trading services is creating inclusive financial ecosystems, especially for users without access to traditional investment tools.

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer & Risk Disclosure
disclaimer.warningText: Trading in financial instruments, including but not limited to forex, CFDs, stocks, cryptocurrencies, and derivatives, carries a high level of risk and may not be suitable for all investors. You should carefully consider your investment objectives, level of experience, and risk appetite before engaging in copy trading.
disclaimer.noProfitText: The content provided on this platform is intended solely for informational and educational purposes and does not constitute financial, investment, or trading advice. Copy trading involves the automatic replication of another trader's positions and does not guarantee profits or protection from losses. Past performance of any trader or trading strategy does not guarantee future results.
disclaimer.leverageText: Leverage can amplify both gains and losses. You could lose more than your initial investment. Only invest funds that you can afford to lose completely. Never invest borrowed money or funds needed for essential expenses.
disclaimer.volatilityText: Financial markets are subject to sudden and unpredictable volatility. Prices can move rapidly against your position, resulting in substantial losses in a short period of time. Market conditions, economic events, and geopolitical factors can significantly impact trading outcomes.
disclaimer.responsibilityText: By using this platform, you acknowledge that all trading decisions are made at your own risk. You are solely responsible for evaluating the merits and risks associated with using copy trading services. We strongly recommend conducting your own research and seeking advice from a qualified financial advisor before engaging in any trading activities.
disclaimer.liabilityText: The platform, its operators, affiliates, or associated third parties are not liable for any losses incurred, whether directly or indirectly, as a result of reliance on information available through this service or the actions of any copied traders. We do not provide personalized investment advice or recommendations.
disclaimer.performanceText: Historical trader performance is not indicative of future results. A trader's past success does not guarantee continued profitability. All trading involves risk, and even experienced traders can experience losses.
disclaimer.complianceText: It is your responsibility to ensure that your use of our services complies with all applicable laws and regulations in your jurisdiction. Some jurisdictions may restrict or prohibit certain types of trading activities.
disclaimer.riskManagementText: Always ensure you fully understand the risks and features of the financial instruments you intend to trade. Make use of risk management tools such as stop-loss orders where possible. Diversify your investment portfolio and never invest more than you can afford to lose. Consider starting with a demo account to familiarize yourself with the platform before committing real funds.
disclaimer.acknowledgment: By accessing and using TED Brokers platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to this disclaimer and all associated risks.

aboutUs.companyOverview.title: Company Overview
aboutUs.companyOverview.p1: At TED Brokers, we are passionate about transforming the financial trading landscape by making advanced investment opportunities accessible to everyone. Our platform empowers users to automatically copy the strategies of top-performing traders in real time, removing the complexities often associated with traditional trading. Founded by a team of fintech experts and industry veterans, our mission is to combine transparency, innovation, and usability to deliver a seamless copy trading experience. We continuously invest in research, platform development, and trader analytics to ensure we remain at the forefront of the industry, serving both novice and experienced investors across the globe.
aboutUs.companyOverview.transparencyText: We believe in transparent financial practices and are committed to upholding the highest ethical standards. Every transaction is thoroughly vetted and documented, ensuring users have full visibility into their investments.
aboutUs.companyOverview.innovationText: We stay at the forefront of technology, continuously innovating our platform to provide users with the latest features and tools. This ensures that users have access to the most up-to-date investment strategies.
aboutUs.mission.title: Mission & Vision
aboutUs.mission.text: Our mission is to democratize trading by providing everyone — regardless of experience — access to powerful, data-driven investment tools. We aim to foster a transparent and secure environment where users can confidently follow the trading strategies of proven experts and grow their wealth passively. Our vision is to become the world's most trusted and user-friendly copy trading broker, enabling millions of investors to make smarter financial decisions through automation, trust, and innovation.
aboutUs.team.title: Our Team
aboutUs.team.text: Behind TED Brokers is a diverse and passionate team of developers, financial analysts, compliance officers, and customer support specialists. Each member brings years of experience from leading fintech and trading firms, working together to craft a platform that's both technically robust and user-friendly. From the product visionaries designing intuitive experiences to the engineers ensuring uptime and security, our team is united by a single goal: to help users succeed in their investment journey.
aboutUs.regulation.title: Regulation & Licensing
aboutUs.regulation.text: Transparency and trust are at the core of everything we do. TED Brokers operates under strict regulatory guidelines and holds relevant licenses from reputable financial authorities. We adhere to international compliance standards including KYC (Know Your Customer), AML (Anti-Money Laundering), and data protection laws to ensure user safety and financial integrity. All client funds are held in segregated accounts with trusted banking partners, and our platform undergoes regular audits to maintain the highest levels of accountability and reliability.
aboutUs.whyChoose.title: Why Choose Us?
aboutUs.whyChoose.intro: Choosing TED Brokers means partnering with a company that truly values your success. Whether you're new to trading or looking to diversify your strategy, our platform offers:
aboutUs.whyChoose.item1: ✅ A curated list of top traders with detailed performance analytics
aboutUs.whyChoose.item2: ✅ Real-time execution and instant strategy syncing
aboutUs.whyChoose.item4: ✅ Responsive customer support available around the clock
aboutUs.whyChoose.item5: ✅ A user-friendly dashboard to track and manage your investments
aboutUs.whyChoose.outro: Join thousands of investors who trust us to simplify trading and maximize their earning potential.

faqs.general.title: General Questions
faqs.general.text: TED Brokers is a platform that allows users to mirror the trades of experienced and successful traders in real-time. It's an excellent way for beginners to participate in financial markets without needing deep trading knowledge. All trading is conducted transparently, and users can view trader performance metrics before selecting someone to follow. Our platform supports a variety of financial instruments including forex, cryptocurrencies, indices, and commodities. We also offer tools to help you monitor your account performance, risk levels, and profitability so you can make informed decisions. Whether you're new to trading or simply prefer a more hands-off approach, copy trading provides a smart, convenient entry point into the financial world.
faqs.account.title: Account/Verification
faqs.account.text: Creating an account with TED Brokers is quick and straightforward. Simply sign up using your email address or social login, and complete your profile with basic information such as your name, contact number, and country of residence. To comply with international regulations and ensure platform security, all users are required to verify their identity. This involves uploading a valid government-issued ID (such as a passport or driver's license) and a recent utility bill or bank statement to confirm your address. Verification typically takes 1–2 business days, and you will be notified via email once your account is approved. Verified users gain full access to all features including funding, withdrawals, and copy trading.
faqs.funding.title: Funding/Withdrawal
faqs.funding.text: We support multiple funding options including credit/debit cards, bank transfers, and popular e-wallets such as Skrill, Neteller, and cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and USDT. Once your account is verified, you can fund your trading wallet directly from your dashboard. Most deposits are processed instantly, while bank transfers may take 1–3 business days. Withdrawals are just as simple. Navigate to the withdrawal section, choose your preferred method, and enter the amount. Please note that for security reasons, withdrawals must be made using the same method used for deposit. Our team processes withdrawal requests within 24 hours, though times may vary based on your selected payment provider.
faqs.risks.title: Copy Trading-related Risks
faqs.risks.text: While copy trading can offer a hands-off approach to investing, it's important to understand the associated risks. Past performance of a trader does not guarantee future results, and market conditions can change rapidly. Following a trader with a high risk appetite could result in significant losses, especially if you don't monitor your exposure or adjust your portfolio accordingly. We encourage users to diversify by following multiple traders with different strategies, use the available risk management tools such as stop-loss limits, and never invest more than you can afford to lose. TED Brokers provides detailed trader analytics and risk scores to help you make informed choices, but ultimately, the responsibility lies with the investor.

tradersPage.earnings.title: Earnings System: How Traders Make Money
tradersPage.earnings.step1.title: Subscription Fees
tradersPage.earnings.step1.text: Earn monthly subscription fees from followers who value your trading insights. Set your own subscription price based on your performance and experience level.
tradersPage.earnings.step2.title: Performance-Based Commissions
tradersPage.earnings.step2.text: Receive a percentage of the profits generated for your followers. The better your performance, the more you earn through our profit-sharing model.
tradersPage.earnings.step3.title: Volume-Based Bonuses
tradersPage.earnings.step3.text: Unlock additional bonuses as you attract more followers and generate higher trading volumes. Our tiered reward system recognizes and rewards growth.
tradersPage.requirements.label: Trader Requirements
tradersPage.requirements.title: What You Need to Qualify as a Trader
tradersPage.requirements.intro: We maintain high standards for our traders to ensure quality trading insights for our community. Here are the key requirements to qualify:
tradersPage.requirements.item1: Minimum 1 year of verifiable trading experience
tradersPage.requirements.item2: Consistent profitability over the last 3 months
tradersPage.requirements.item4: Ability to connect a supported trading platform
tradersPage.requirements.item5: Completion of our verification and compliance process
